Opcode.Message: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is started.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is stopped.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_STOP

Opcode.Message: Events logged after a memory allocation.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_ALLOC

Opcode.Message: Events logged when exhaustion of a resource is detected.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_DETECTION_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged when a problem is detected.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_DETECTION_RESULT

Opcode.Message: Events logged when diagnosis is started.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_DIAGNOSIS_START

Opcode.Message: Events logged when diagnosis is stopped.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_DIAGNOSIS_STOP

Opcode.Message: Contains the results of the diagnosis.
Opcode.Name: RDR_DET_OPCODE_DIAGNOSIS_RESULT

Keyword.Message: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Keyword.Name: RDR_DET_KEYWORD_LIFECYCLE

Keyword.Message: Events related to exhaustion of system commit limit (virtual memory).
Keyword.Name: RDR_DET_KEYWORD_MEMORY_EXHAUSTION

Keyword.Message: Event generated when heap leak detection is about to be started on a process.
Keyword.Name: RDR_DET_KEYWORD_HEAP_LEAK_DETECTION

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is started.
Event.Keyword: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector started.

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is stopped.
Event.Keyword: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector stopped.

Event.Opcode: Events logged when a problem is detected.
Event.Keyword: Events related to exhaustion of system commit limit (virtual memory).
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector received a notification that the computer is low on virtual memory.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SystemCommitLimit" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SystemCommitCharge" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is started.
Event.Keyword: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector failed to start due to an error.

Event.Opcode: Events logged when the resource exhaustion detector is stopped.
Event.Keyword: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector failed to stop due to an error.

Event.Opcode: Events logged after a memory allocation.
Event.Keyword: Events related to lifecycle of resource exhaustion detector.
Event.Message: The Windows Resource Exhaustion Detector experienced a memory allocation failure.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RequestSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Contains the results of the diagnosis.
Event.Keyword: Events related to exhaustion of system commit limit (virtual memory).
Event.Message: Windows failed to diagnose a low virtual memory condition.

Event.Opcode: Contains the results of the diagnosis.
Event.Keyword: Events related to exhaustion of system commit limit (virtual memory).
Event.Message: Windows successfully diagnosed a low virtual memory condition. The following programs consumed the most virtual memory: %21 (%22) consumed %24 bytes, %28 (%29) consumed %31 bytes, and %35 (%36) consumed %38 bytes.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SystemCommitLimit" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SystemCommitCharge" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ProcessCommitCharge" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PagedPoolUsage" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PhysicalMemorySize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PhysicalMemoryUsage" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolUsage" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="TotalProcesses" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PagedPoolTag_1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PagedPoolUsed_1" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PagedPoolTag_2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PagedPoolUsed_2" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PagedPoolTag_3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PagedPoolUsed_3" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolTag_1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolUsed_1" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolTag_2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolUsed_2" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolTag_3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NonPagedPoolUsed_3" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data
